name: minayaceramiccreations
description: VERB 		 | 		  PATH 		 |  	 DESCRIPTION ------------ | ------------- | ------------------- GET | /ceramics | index of ceramic pieces | GET | /ceramics/:id | show page for selected piece | GET | /ceramics/new | page to add newly available ceramic piece | POST | /ceramics | add new ceramic piece to site | GET | /ceramics/:id/edit | page to edit a photo | PUT | /ceramics/:id | edit/update a piece from the collection | DELETE | /ceramics/:id | delete ceramic piece that is no longer available |
